textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Androgynous, downtown, sexy-tough, and provocative are all words fashion editors use to describe T by Alexander Wang, a collection that gives the so-soft T-shirt center stage. In signature Wang fashion, each tee, tank, and dress is meticulously designed with stretched-out necklines, deep armholes, and mini pockets, yet rendered with a slouchy, what-this-old-thing insouciance. "It's like sleeping in a T-shirt and wearing it the next day," Wang tells NewYork Magazine. "It's draped and kind of wilted."
